title: Number of outbound trips from China to Europe in 2018 , by region of destination
summary: This is a bar chart representing Europe European Union in the x axis and Arrivals in millions in the y axis.
The Arrivals in millions is appeared to be the highest at Europe European Union Central/Eastern Europe and lowest at Europe European Union Southern/Mediterranean Europe.
The highest Europe European Union Central/Eastern Europe has 4.81 more Arrivals in millions than the lowest Europe European Union Southern/Mediterranean Europe.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Arrivals in millions for 4 number of Europe European Unions.
The Arrivals in millions is appeared to be the highest at Europe European Union Central/Eastern Europe and lowest at Europe European Union Southern/Mediterranean Europe.
The second highest Arrivals in millions is appeared to be the Europe European Union Western Europe.
The highest Europe European Union Central/Eastern Europe has 4.81 more Arrivals in millions than the lowest Europe European Union Southern/Mediterranean Europe.
Arrivals in millions at Europe European Union Central/Eastern Europe is 5.93 , second place is Western Europe at 5.9, and thirdly is Northern Europe at 1.15.
The Europe European Union Southern/Mediterranean Europe tends to be 1.68 percent lower than average.
Summing up the values of all Europe European Unions, we get total 14.1.
